question: Which Indian shooter won gold medal in the women's 10m air pistol?
explanation: India's Manu Bhaker has won gold medal in the women's 10m air pistol and Ravi Kumar has won bronze medal in the men's 10m air pistol in the ISSF World Cup in Guadalajara, Mexico. Manu Bhaker defeated Mexico's Alejandra Zavala with 10.8 in the last shot of the 24 shot final of the women's 10m air pistol. She topped with 237.5 and won gold medal in the women's 10m air pistol. She is just 16 years old. Alejandra Zavala finished at the second position with 237.1 and France's Celine Goberville came third with 217.0 in the women's 10m air pistol.
